QuestData.Title: All Wrapped Up
QuestData.Description:
While I was able to get out of the mine, some of my friends weren't so lucky. I saw those spiders wrap them up in their webs... probably to save them for a snack.
It was terrible, but all I could do was run.
Will you help them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy Writhing Cocoons to rescue $1oa Bleak Hills Miners in the Bleak Hills Mine.
QuestData.CompletionText: I can't imagine how scared those miners are...
QuestData.RewardText:
You saved them!
You're certainly a hero in my book!
